article_title: Where things stand after six months of the Israel-Hamas war.
sentence: About  1,200  Israelis  were  killed  and  more  than  250  others  taken  hostage  during  the  attacks.

article_title: Where things stand after six months of the Israel-Hamas war.
sentence: An  Israeli  military  campaign  has  followed,  which  has  killed  more  than  33,000  Palestinians,  mainly  women  and  children,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Where things stand after six months of the Israel-Hamas war.
sentence: Mourners  have  been  attending  the  memorial  site  for  those  killed  during  the  Nova  m  usic  festival  in  the  7  October  Hamas  attacks,  near  the  border  with  Gaza,  in  southern  Israel.
